description:
Flow to trigger a standard Authentication experience, which includes:
Standard Username/Password Login
Gateway Migration
Kerberos Authentication
Passwordless Login
Change Password
Forgot Password
Forgot Username

aggregateFido.description: Aggregate FIDO device for Passwordless form
aggregateFido.name: aggregateFido

mandatoryAuthenticationMethods.description: Authentication methods required to register for PingID
mandatoryAuthenticationMethods.name: mandatoryAuthenticationMethods

allowedBackUpMethods.name: allowedBackUpMethods

nodeDescription.value: Lookup the user with Email to find the Users PingOne ID. If the user does not exist, attempt to migrate the User through the gateway
Validate password. Allow the user to fail 3 times before failing out
Migrate the User and attributes through the gateway connnection
User was successful, send the user down the true branch with the appropriate attributes

annotation.value: Succesful branch of the flow. Return all require attributes back to the main flow to continue the next part of the journey if needed.

nodeDescription.value: Increment the number for each retry the user attempts
